name: vsts-dropplan
description: Sprint Drop Plan is an organizational tool that helps team members to sync their tasks by visualizing work status and dependencies on a sprint-based calendar.

scripts.build: (gulp && cd dist/dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json && cd ../qa && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json && cd ../prod && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json)
